features: Unlimited AI chat messages per day

Chat.placeholderActive: Ask about any meeting - deadlines, decisions, action items, participants...

Chat.description: I can search across all your meetings to find information, summarize discussions, and answer questions
Chat.title: Ask AI chatbot any question about all your meetings
Chat.suggestion1: What were the key decisions made in yesterday's product meeting?
Chat.suggestion2: Summarize the action items from last week's standup
Chat.suggestion3: Who attended the client presentation on Monday?
Chat.suggestion4: What deadlines were discussed in recent meetings?
Chat.suggestion5: Generate a follow-up email for the marketing meeting
Chat.suggestion6: What feedback was given about the new feature?

Integrations.IntegrationsDescription: Connect your favourite tools to automatically add action items from meetings
Integrations.HowItWorks2: Choose where to send action items during setup
Integrations.HowItWorks3: In meetings, hover over action items and click Add to
Integrations.HowItWorks4: Select which tool(s) to add the task to from the dropdown
